sources: NSW Planning Portal - DA Processing Times 2024-2025
Industry benchmarks - RLB, Rider Levett Bucknall
assumptions: No major appeals or legal challenges
Normal market conditions for labour and materials
All durations in weeks unless stated
metadata.notes: Durations are indicative. Apply location, complexity, and reform factors as appropriate.

standardPhases.description: Standard phase definitions for consistency across project types

cdc.notes: Complying Development Certificate - 20 business day statutory

complex_da.notes: Complex DA with neighbour objections or variations

phases.name: Construction Documentation
phases.notes: Can commence during DA if approval likely

low_rise_reform.notes: Low-Rise Housing Code (Feb 2025) - fast track for compliant designs

complex_da.notes: Complex DA with panel, heritage, or objections

phases.name: Design Development
phases.notes: Can commence at-risk during DA assessment

duration.notes: 2 years for major defects (statutory), 6 years for structural

low_rise_reform.notes: Low-Rise Housing Code - compliant dual occ/terraces

phases.name: Schematic Design
activities: Design Excellence Panel (City of Sydney, etc)

considerations.after_hours: May require after-hours or weekend work in occupied buildings
considerations.access: Goods lift booking and material staging

phases.name: Modular/Prefab Option
activities: Site works and foundations (parallel with fabrication)

duration.notes: Varies - may be indefinite for some sites

durationFactors.description: Multipliers to apply to base durations

building_scale.description: For apartments and office construction phases

cdc_complying.notes: Complying Development Certificate - 20 business days statutory

low_rise_reform.notes: Low-Rise Housing Code (Feb 2025) - dual occ, terraces

mid_rise_reform.notes: Mid-Rise Housing Code (Feb 2025) - infill apartments to 6 storeys

complex_da.notes: Complex DA - heritage, VPA, significant objection

nla.description: For fitout projects - Net Lettable Area

urgent.notes: Fast-track - reduced scope or parallel activities

regional_nsw.notes: Regional NSW - less constraints but material logistics

procurement_method.description: Impact of procurement method on program

criticalPathNotes.description: Typical critical path drivers by project type
